function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to increased use of remote healthcare services (telehealth).","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread if telehealth services are not efficiently managed.","Mitigation":"Implement strict protocols for remote consultations, use of protective gear, and regular disinfection of telehealth equipment.","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, remote monitoring devices, and AI-driven diagnostic tools.","People":"Healthcare providers, patients, and telehealth service providers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, telehealth service providers."},{"Description":"Challenges in managing the implementation of 5G technologies for healthcare use cases.","Impact":"Inefficient or delayed deployment of 5G healthcare solutions, hindering efforts to combat COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Invest in training for healthcare professionals, improve infrastructure, and streamline regulatory processes for 5G implementation.","Technologies":"5G networks, edge computing, network slicing.","People":"Healthcare professionals, technology providers, regulatory authorities.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology providers, regulatory authorities."}]}
